name: Artanis
title: Hierarch of the Daelaam
description: A tough Bruiser that deals high damage if the enemy team is unable to shut him down.

primary.name: Blade Dash
primary.description: Dash forward and deal 59.28 (+4% per level) damage to enemies, then return and deal 177.84 damage. Every enemy hit reduces the cooldown on Shield Overload by 1 second, and Heroes by 2 seconds.

primary.name: Twin Blades
primary.description: Artanis's next Basic Attack immediately causes him to charge a short distance and strike the enemy 2 times.

primary.name: Phase Prism
primary.description: Fire a Phase Prism that deals 68.64 damage to the first Hero hit and swaps Artanis's position with theirs. Can be used during Blade Dash.

primary.name: Suppression Pulse
primary.description: Fire a large area pulse from the Spear of Adun, dealing 118.56 damage and Blinding enemies for 4 seconds. Unlimited range.

primary.name: Purifier Beam
primary.description: Target an enemy Hero with an orbital beam from the Spear of Adun, dealing 191.36 damage per second for 8 seconds. The beam will chase the target as they move. Unlimited range.

primary.name: Shield Overload
primary.description: After taking damage while below 75% Health grants Artanis a 390 point Shield for 5 seconds. Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of Shield Overload by 4 seconds.

1.name: Reactive Parry
1.description:
Using Twin Blades grants 50 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing its damage by 50%.

Stores up to 2 charges.

1.name: Amateur Opponent
1.description: Twin Blades attacks deal 150% bonus damage to non-Heroes.

1.name: Seasoned Marksman
1.questDescription: Every Minion killed near you grants 0 Attack Damage, and Takedowns grant 0 Attack Damage.
1.rewardDescription: Upon gaining 0 bonus Attack Damage, you can also activate Seasoned Marksman to increase your Attack Speed by 40% for 3 seconds. 60 second cooldown.

4.name: Psionic Synergy
4.description: Increases Blade Dash's cooldown reduction of Shield Overload by hitting Heroes by 2 seconds.

4.name: Shield Battery
4.description: Shield Overload's cooldown recharges 50% faster while its shield is active, and the shield duration is increased by 1 second.

4.name: Shield Surge
4.description: Increases Shield Overload's Shields by 75% while below 25% Health.

7.name: Solarite Reaper
7.description: Increases the damage of the first dash of Blade Dash by 150%.

7.name: Warp Sickness
7.description: Phase Prism also slows the enemy's Movement Speed by 35% for 4 seconds.

7.name: Chrono Surge
7.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Phase Prism grants 50% bonus Attack Speed for 5 seconds.

7.name: Follow Through
7.description: After using an Ability, your next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% additional damage.

10.name: Suppression Pulse
10.description: Fire a large area pulse from the Spear of Adun, dealing 118.56 damage and Blinding enemies for 4 seconds. Unlimited range.

10.name: Purifier Beam
10.description: Target an enemy Hero with an orbital beam from the Spear of Adun, dealing 191.36 damage per second for 8 seconds. The beam will chase the target as they move. Unlimited range.

13.name: Templar's Zeal
13.description: Blade Dash cooldown recharges 150% faster while below 50% Health.

13.name: Triple Strike
13.description: Increases Twin Blades's number of Basic Attacks to 3, but increase its cooldown by 1 second.

13.name: Graviton Vortex
13.description: Phase Prism pulls and damages an additional enemy Hero near the first, and its cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.

13.name: Phase Bulwark
13.description: When Shield Overload activates, gain 40 Spell Armor for 4 seconds, reducing Ability Damage taken by 40%.

16.name: Zealot Charge
16.description: Increase Twin Blades charge distance by 100%.

16.name: Titan Killer
16.description: Twin Blades attacks against Heroes deal an additional 2% of the target's maximum Health in damage.

16.name: Psionic Wound
16.description: Twin Blades final strike lowers a Hero's Armor by 25 for 2 seconds, increasing all damage taken by 25%.

16.name: Plasma Burn
16.description: While Shield Overload is active, deal 57.2 damage per second to nearby enemies.

20.name: Orbital Bombardment
20.description: Suppression Pulse gains an additional charge. There is a 10 second cooldown between uses.

20.name: Target Purified
20.description: If the target of Purifier Beam dies, it automatically recasts on the nearest visible enemy Hero.

20.name: Force of Will
20.description: Increases Shield Overload's cooldown reduction from Basic Attacks to 6 seconds.

20.name: Nexus Blades
20.description: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.
